Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: I too would prefer we keep the oneof StaticCollectionConfig. Can’t we just consider this to be a collection that is statically defined during chaincode instantiation, but whose definition (as of 1.2) is mutable across chaincode versions? Keeping as oneof allows flexibility in the future for other types.

Action.author: manish-sethi
Action.body: ~Senthil1 - I think that as we are moving ahead with existing `StaticCollectionConfig`, I think that you may like to close this jira
